body_html:
Microbenchmarks for functions. Time in microseconds. I see an average slowdown of 0.001-0.006 microseconds = 1-6 nanoseconds. @apaszke I think it's ok?

Benchmark code: https://gist.github.com/goldsborough/f624ee597734a75e07222286131a31c2

Built with -O3

Before

requires_grad: average time: 0.108163 | min time: 0.105 | max time: 0.441

set_requires_grad: average time: 0.11338 | min time: 0.102 | max time: 7.73

grad: average time: 0.146497 | min time: 0.139 | max time: 0.281

After

requires_grad: average time: 0.114218 | min time: 0.109 | max time: 0.28

set_requires_grad: average time: 0.119656 | min time: 0.105 | max time: 11.184

grad: average time: 0.147445 | min time: 0.14 | max time: 0.354

body:
Microbenchmarks for functions. Time in microseconds. I see an average slowdown of 0.001-0.006 microseconds = 1-6 nanoseconds. @apaszke I think it's ok?

Benchmark code: https://gist.github.com/goldsborough/f624ee597734a75e07222286131a31c2

Built with `-O3`

## Before

```
requires_grad: average time: 0.108163 | min time: 0.105 | max time: 0.441

set_requires_grad: average time: 0.11338 | min time: 0.102 | max time: 7.73

grad: average time: 0.146497 | min time: 0.139 | max time: 0.281
```

## After

```
requires_grad: average time: 0.114218 | min time: 0.109 | max time: 0.28

set_requires_grad: average time: 0.119656 | min time: 0.105 | max time: 11.184

grad: average time: 0.147445 | min time: 0.14 | max time: 0.354
```
